Hello blank fragment Blink Vibrate Triggers - %1$s when Apache License, Version 2.0 App Version 1.7.1 About https://github.com/oVirt/moVirt/wiki/User%27s-guide Load Clear Search Sort by Order Periodic Sync Enable periodic sync with custom interval instead of system's schedule. Enabling with short interval consumes battery! Global Sync Engines with enabled sync are synced or disables sync for all engines if unchecked. Sync Interval Periodic sync interval in minutes. protocol://host:port/path/to/api protocol://host:port/path/to/cert Fetched from For example: https://my-instance:443/ovirt-engine/api name@domain password Username Password Admin Privilege Valid for hostnames (comma separated) Tells oVirt if the user has admin privileges.
